4315230.name: Foul Deeds of Iblis
4315230.description:
Description:

Iblis usurps the Ancient Temple of Astrology to indulge in divinations. The temple serves as congregation spot between fortune tellers and their Gods, also known as the Celestials. Entry to outsiders was strictly forbidden but Iblis tricks the fortune tellers to get inside. He learns that In order for divinations to take place the God's demand 'unique' offering. Unique in the sense something they have never been offered before. Thus recent news about biblical relics moving out of a renovating museum serves as a golden opportunity for Iblis to snatch what he believes, is something different. While the relics are flown mid-air by civilian chopper, they are taken down with ease. One injured survivor find a way out. He is your Grandpa Albert Perry, a museum curator who engages in a brave tussle with Iblis for the priceless relics. Grandpa sends a SOS message to John, mentioning his whereabouts before going silent. 

Gameplay:

Foul Deeds of Iblis is a horror game where you play as John Perry and must serve two objectives. First is to rescue your only blood relative- Grandpa Albert from inside a temple possessed by vicious djinn's. The second objective is extraction of five biblical relics from the evil grasp of Iblis. Your navigation and intuition skills will be tested time and again. Several letters' written by grandpa serve as ray of hope even in a dark, oppressive labyrinth beneath the temple. Be cautious, the immortal djinn and his inhuman companions will throw punches, jabs, kicks and jump-scares to halt your momentum...

Features:

  • First person walking simulator with deep story

  • Collect items, relics in context of the game.

  • Tolerable Jump scares

  • Realistic Graphics

  • Original Sound Effects

  • Tense Atmosphere throughout

Playtime: 50 Minutes - 1 hour

Note: Best played with Ultra Settings
